hopobject.name: Rocamo
hopobject.http_browser: Mozilla/4.0 (compatible; MSIE 8.0; Windows NT 5.1; Trident/4.0; .NET CLR 1.0.3705; .NET CLR 1.1.4322; Media Center PC 4.0; .NET CLR 2.0.50727; .NET CLR 3.0.4506.2152; .NET CLR 3.5.30729)
hopobject.body: Rocamo is a fast, autonomous robotic camera platform designed to track a target on a vehicle in front. It is being developed as part of the TiroKart project but could also be used as a powerful BeagleBoard-based platform for robotics development.
hopobject.shortdesc: A BeagleBoard-xM robotic camera platform that can track vehicles at over 30MPH.
